availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaac D. Nance (Hopkins co. farm laborer and private 35th ky inf usa)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier. North Carolina native. Son of David Nance and Eliza Nance. Student in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farm laborer in Hopkins County in 1860. Served in the 35th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as private from October 1, 1863, to December 29, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 153A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 819.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0415.
